Welcome to BookHub! 

		BookHub is an Android application that helps users to view books and add them to favourites. 

They can also see the book's description. 

This app was made as my second project during my Internshala Training. 


Main Concepts Implemented 

		1.Activities, Fragments and Lifecycles 

		2.Volley Library to fetch data from Internet 

		3.Recycler View and its adapter 

		4.DBA AsyncTask for storing databases

This is an app created for the purpose of learning Mobile Application Development to the level of handling multi-screen, using fragment, involvement of shared preference, using Recycler View as well as using database to store data.
